thread.title: President Trump reiterates his Syria 'safe zones' plan | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: President Trump reiterates his Syria 'safe zones' plan | Daily Mail Online

author: Kaileen Gaul For Dailymail.Com
title: President Trump reiterates his Syria 'safe zones' plan | Daily Mail Online
text: Trump outlines Syria 'safe zones' plan in lieu of admitting more refugees - but says the Gulf States are responsible for paying $20TRILLION for them President Trump said the Gulf States would pay for the $20 trillion safe zones He called the situation a 'mess' and wants to keep refugees out of the country President Obama has said safe zones are too large of a military commitment Turkish President Erdoğan has also proposed a 'terror free zone' for Syrians Syrian President Bashar al-Assad said he does not think the zones will work
